channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Cognos TM1
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Cognos TM1

item.title: CVE-2017-1506|2024-08-05T13:32:30.269Z -- ibm -- cognos%20tm1
item.description: IBM Cognos TM1 10.2 and 10.2.2 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 129617.
